body_html:
Thanks for making this change! It's going to be easier for us to make this change internally, since it changes a core public interface that a lot of people are using internally.

cc @jhseu @rohan100jain, perhaps use this change as a seed for the internal change, and make sure to credit @llhe ?

Alternatively, we can keep the old interface around so we can pull this change internally without too many problems, and then get rid of it once all of the internal uses are changed.

body:
Thanks for making this change!  It's going to be easier for us to make this change internally, since it changes a core public interface that a lot of people are using internally.  

cc @jhseu @rohan100jain, perhaps use this change as a seed for the internal change, and make sure to credit @llhe ?

Alternatively, we can keep the old interface around so we can pull this change internally without too many problems, and then get rid of it once all of the internal uses are changed.
